Oraconfig provides for automatic configuration and simplified the prerequisites for installing Oracle Database on Linux systems.

=== Compile Oraconfig ===
Oracle oraconfig configure the prerequisites for Oracle Database 11g 
 

* Download oraconfig in Home Directory
* / Home
* Extract  oraconfig.sh in Home
* Apen Terminal 
* log in as root user
* Insert password
* ./ oraconfig.sh
 

* If there are problems with the script to check the permissions on the file and check if it has  
 been selected as an executable program
* <nowiki>[[ https:--wiki.ubuntu.com-oraconfig|Download Oraconfig]]</nowiki>
Run oraconfig.sh From Shell.

Please read the notes contained in the report at the end dell'escuzione configuration.
